title: George Washington Memorial Parkway: Laws & Policies
body: Laws & Policies       Rules and regulations that apply to all National Park Service sites may be found in Title 36 of the Code of Federal Regulations (Parks, Forests, and Public Property), Chapter I, Parts 1-199. Rules and regulations specific to the parkway are found in the park compendium. Record of Determination Reconfirming and Restating Bicycles are not allowed on roadways of the Clara Barton and George Washington Memorial Parkways.
